description:
English has four skills: listening, speaking, reading, and writing. However, you can't be  good at these skills if you are not good at grammar !

Learn How to Use Verbs in English Correctly with this Course for Non-Native English Speakers.  

  • Learn how to use verb tenses in English correctly.
  • Learn how to use modal verbs correctly.
  • Learn how to make questions correctly.
  • Learn how to change sentences into negative correctly.
  • Learn how to use and form the passive voice correctly.
  • Learn how to use gerunds and infinitives correctly. 
  • Learn how to use phrasal verbs correctly.


A Course Overview:

In this course, you're  going to learn about the 12 "Verb Tenses" in English. Each video is a very detailed one. You'll learn about the verb from of each tense. You will also learn how to use negative and questions in each tense.

Moreover, you'll learn about "Modal Verbs" and their different functions in English.

You will also find a fully detailed lesson about forming "Questions and Negative".

You will learn how to use the "Passive Voice" to make your writing looks professional. I will teach you how to form the verb in the passive voice in a very easy way!

You will also learn about the "Gerunds and Infinitives" and their uses in English.

Finally, you will learn about phrasal verbs and how to use them to sound like a native English speaker! 

You will find many resources with each lecture to practice what you learn.

Don't forget that there will be live hangout every now and then to discuss your questions live!!
title: English Grammar (Everything about English Verbs)
